title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS 1.0 – Turn-Based Strategy & Historical War Game

title: Moneydance 2019.2 – Personal finance manager
content: Moneydance is a full-featured personal financial management application that includes features such as online banking, online bill payment, investment management, budget tracking, scheduled transactions, check printing, detailed graphs, reports and much more. title: Translator 1.2.1 – Translate from English to around sixty world languages
content: With Translator, you can translate any text between 58 world languages. All you have to do is select your source and target languages, type your text and click on the translation button. title: Dead Island 1.3.0 – Open World Zombies Action & Survival Game

title: Spellarium 4 2.0 – Magical Puzzle Game
